p: THEIC-MR and diethyl chlorophosphate with molar ratio of 1:2 were dissolved in 100 mL of chloroform. The mixture was settled in a 250 mL flask and stirred at 60 °C for 3 h to finish the reaction. THEIC-MR phosphate was gotten after removing chloroform with a rotary. Synthetic route of THEIC-MR-P was presented in Fig. 6.
